Posts.EditableText: It published fine for me. I'm not sure what could be happening for you. Is there anything unusual about your setup? Have you been able to publish before?
Posts.HTML: It published fine for me. I'm not sure what could be happening for you. Is there anything unusual about your setup? Have you been able to publish before?

Posts.EditableText: There is a known issue updating published games - sometimes you may have to wait a little while (there is a process that locks the file for some reason). This should be resolved soon, in the meantime I just suggest trying again after an hour or two
Posts.HTML: There is a known issue updating published games - sometimes you may have to wait a little while (there is a process that locks the file for some reason). This should be resolved soon, in the meantime I just suggest trying again after an hour or two
